abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is expected to announce Tuesday that he has selected a former Wall Street banker as the next deputy mayor for economic development, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is expected to announce Tuesday that he has selected a former Wall Street banker as the next deputy mayor for economic development, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg is expected to announce Tuesday that he has selected a former Wall Street banker as the next deputy mayor for economic development, The New York Times’s Charles V. Bagli reported, citing administration and business officials.

headline.main: Banker Said to Be Mayor’s Development Role Choice
